metadata.title: CVE-2022-31150 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description: undici is an HTTP/1.1 client, written from scratch for Node.js. It ispossible to inject CRLF sequences into request headers in undici inversions less than 5.7.1. A fix was released in version 5.8.0. Sanitizingall HTTP headers from untrusted sources to eliminate `\r\n` is a workaroundfor this issue.

criterions.comment: node-undici package in oracular is affected and may need fixing.
node-undici package in oracular is affected and may need fixing.
